thread.title: Sridevi’s daughter Khushi Kapoor kiss goes viral!
thread.title_full: Sridevi’s daughter Khushi Kapoor kiss goes viral! - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Sridevi’s daughter Khushi Kapoor kiss goes viral!
text:
Only recently, Sridevi's elder daughter Jhanvi was in the news with rumours doing the rounds that she is set to act in a film. Now her younger sister Khushi Kapoor has been making headlines with a photo of her kissing American pop artist Jack Gilinsky, which has gone viral on all social media platforms. Interestingly, this picture was posted three months back in July but has gone viral now.
Formerly a cute chubby kid, Khushi has grown up to be quite a pretty teenager. Khushi had a big fan girl moment when she met Jack Gilinsky; the social media sensation. She captioned the picture: "Hands down one of the best moments of my life."
